- Directly above at (7, 6) there is a free space '.'.
- To the left at (8, 5) there is a green box '%'.
- To the right at (8, 7) there is another free space '.'.

Given that my goal is to eliminate boxes while avoiding hazards, moving up to (7, 6) would be a reasonable move to explore new available routes and possibilities to interact with other boxes. 

Thus, I will take the action to move up.

``` Action:4 ```
This action is intended to explore the area further and possibly set me up for future interactions with the boxes.
